Text: Thank you SO much, this was the last of the New 52, and I was starting to worry that no one was going to upload it. I mean, I've already bought it, but I need it for my digital collection. MM, you're the best!

Minor spoilers:



Whoa, a compound bow! Ollie's getting updated!

Thanks for the upload!

So, let me get this straight:
DC guy #1 - We need Green Arrow to appeal to a younger hipper audience
DC guy #2 - Like they did with Smallville?
DC guy #1 - EXACTLY like that

So Ollie is a bit older and they ditched Chloe for a whole team but this is just Smallville's version of GH ...

guess its good I really liked GH on Smallville...
